deleghe.title: Delegates
deleghe.description: The company's delegates and delegations can be managed here. The first are those that the company delegates to the reading of its notifications. The second are the delegations entrusted to the company.
deleghe.delegatorsTitle: Delegations to be borne by the company
deleghe.delegatorsApiErrorMessage: We were unable to retrieve the delegation data for you.
deleghe.accept_description: To accept the proxy, enter the code {{name}} shared with you.
deleghe.revocation_question: Do you want to revoke the delegation to {{delegate}}?
deleghe.subtitle_rejection: If you decline, you won't be able to read notifications from {{delegator}}.
deleghe.subtitle_revocation: You will no longer be able to read notifications from {{recipient}}.
deleghe.error_subtitle: We were unable to load the page. Reload it, or try again later.
deleghe.no_delegates: {{organizationName}} has not delegated anyone to the reading of its notifications. <0>Add a delegate</0>.
deleghe.no_delegators: There is no delegation to be borne by {{organizationName}}.
deleghe.no_delegators_after_filters: The filters you added did not yield any results.
deleghe.show_code_subtitle: Share this code with the delegate: they will have to enter it when accepting the delegation.
deleghe.tab_deleghe: Delegations to be borne by the company
deleghe.associate-groups-title: Do you want to delegate to a group?
deleghe.associate-groups-subtitle: The group administrator will be able to manage the delegation. Users in the group will only be able to read notifications for that delegation.
deleghe.no-group: Do not assign to a group
deleghe.accepted-error: Due to an error, the delegation has not been accepted. Press Cancel and try again.
deleghe.revoke-error: An error has occurred and the delegation has not been revoked. Please try again.
deleghe.reject-error: An error has occurred and the delegation has not been declined. Please try again.

nuovaDelega.createdTitle: The delegation request has been successfully created
nuovaDelega.createdDescription: Share the verification code with the delegate: they will have to enter it on the first login to SEND and accept the request.
nuovaDelega.title: Add a delegate
nuovaDelega.subtitle: Enter the data of the natural or legal person to whom you want to delegate the reading of the notifications of {{organizationName}}

form.verificationCodeDescr: Share this code with the delegate: they will have to enter it when accepting the delegation.

fiscalCode.wrong: The Tax Code entered is incorrect

expirationDate.required: The delegation end date is required

already_exists.title: Delegation already present
already_exists.message: The person you indicated already has a delegate for this organisation.

not_acceptable.title: Delegation is invalid
not_acceptable.message: The delegation entered is not valid

invalid_verification_code.title: Invalid code
invalid_verification_code.message: The code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
